Colour

Colour of the edge effect.

public SRGBColour Colour

Field Value

SRGBColour

Hollow

Whether the inside of the EdgeEffect rectangle should be empty.

public bool Hollow

Field Value

bool

Offset

Positional offset applied to the edge effect. Useful for off-center shadows.

public Vector2 Offset

Field Value

Vector2

Radius

How "thick" the edge effect is around the CompositeDrawable. In other words: At what distance from the CompositeDrawable's border the edge effect becomes fully invisible.

public float Radius

Field Value

float

Roundness

How round the edge effect should appear. Adds to the CornerRadius of the corresponding CompositeDrawable. Not to confuse with the Radius.

public float Roundness

Field Value

float

Type

The type of the edge effect.

public EdgeEffectType Type

EdgeEffectType
